abstract: Verizon Communications reports third-quarter profit of $1.38 billion, or 49 cents per share, up from $659 million, or 23 cents per share, in year-ago quarter; revenue was $27.9 billion, up 5.4 percent from $26.5 billion.
snippet: The nation’s second-largest telephone company said that its profit doubled during the last quarter, bolstered by an influx of customers attracted by its portfolio of iPhone and Android devices.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s second-largest telephone company said that its profit doubled during the last quarter, bolstered by an influx of customers attracted by its portfolio of iPhone and Android devices.

headline.print_headline: Verizon Profit Doubles as Customers Flock to New Devices
headline.seo: Verizon Profit Doubles; Customers Attracted by High-End Products
